readable.title: 3471117376_40585c3fd1
readable.content: A child in white and pink is picking a white flowered tree next to a fence . A girl in a pink hat pick a flower from a tree . A young girl is picking blossoms from a tree . A young girl with a white vest , pink sleeves and pink knit hat with flower is looking at the flower blossoms on a tree . The girl dressed in pink and white , and wearing a knit cap , is reaching toward a flowering tree .
